Method Detail

exchange

java.lang.Object exchange(java.util.Map args, groovy.lang.Closure c = null)
Defines a new exchange.
Parameters:
args - The properties of the exchange, such as its name and whether it is durable or not.
c - An optional closure that includes queue definitions. If provided, the queues are bound to this exchange.
